#summary Alien Blood Bath FAQs

*Q:* Problems updating? <br>
*A:* Try un-installing existing versions first.

*Q:* How many levels are there? <br>
*A:* Three levels are available in the public "lite" version. Feel free to contribute to the level editor or more levels of your own.

*Q:* Why is it so bad? <br>
*A:* Code patches are welcome.
